subject: Re: [junit] JUnit will not run on JDeveloper
msgSnippet: Hint: You don t run your test class, you run a test runner. So said  viet5459  on  2002-11-07 ...  J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software
messageBody:
Hint: You don't run your test class, you run a test runner.

So said viet5459 on 2002-11-07

>I receive the following error from JDeveloper when running the
>MoneyTester class:
>
>The target MoneyTester1.java cannot be started as a servlet, because
>the class MoneyTester1 does not extend javax.servlet.GenericServlet.
>
>The target MoneyTester1.java cannot be started as an application,
>because the class MoneyTester1 does not have a main method.
<snip />

J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
